press_button.description: Press the button to flush the toilet.

clean_button.description: Clean the button to keep it hygienic.

close_seat.description: Close the seat by swinging it down to the closed position.

clean_open_seat.description: Clean the open seat to maintain hygiene.

open_seat.description: Open the seat by swinging it up to the opened position.

clean_closed_seat.description: Clean the closed seat to maintain hygiene.

clean_toilet_body.description: Clean the toilet body to remove dust or any other particles.

clean_whole_toilet.description: Clean the entire toilet, including the toilet body, seat, and button.

use_toilet.description: Use the toilet, which involves opening the seat, doing the business, closing the seat, and flushing.
